original_text: And the people that they are speaking their messages to will also die because of war and famine. Their bodies will lie in Jerusalem's streets. Nobody will be there to bury them. This will happen to the men, their wives, their sons and their daughters. I will punish them as they deserve, because they are so wicked. And the people that they are speaking their messages to will also die because of war and famine. Their bodies will lie in Jerusalem's streets. Nobody will be there to bury them. This will happen to the men, their wives, their sons and their daughters. I will punish them as they deserve, because they are so wicked. And the people that they are speaking their messages to will also die because of war and famine. Their bodies will lie in Jerusalem's streets. Nobody will be there to bury them. This will happen to the men, their wives, their sons and their daughters. I will punish them as they deserve, because they are so wicked.
korean_text: 그들의 예언을 받은 백성은 기근과 칼로 말미암아 예루살렘 거리에 던짐을 당할 것인즉 그들을 장사할 자가 없을 것이요 그들의 아내와 아들과 딸이 그렇게 되리니 이는 내가 그들의 악을 그 위에 부음이니라

sentences.original_text: And the people that they are speaking their messages to
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그들의 메시지를 전하는 대상이 되는 사람들은

sentences.original_text: will also die because of war and famine
sentences.korean_translation: 전쟁과 기근으로 인해 또한 죽을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Their bodies will lie in Jerusalem's streets
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 시체는 예루살렘 거리에 누워 있을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody will be there to bury them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 장사해 줄 사람이 아무도 없을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: This will happen to the men
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 남자들에게 일어날 것입니다

sentences.original_text: their wives
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아내들

sentences.original_text: their sons and their daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아들들과 딸들에게

sentences.original_text: I will punish them as they deserve
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 마땅히 받아야 할 대로 그들을 벌할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: because they are so wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 매우 악하기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: And the people that they are speaking their messages to
